text: tame te loko sathe lada'i karava mate kema taiyara nathi raheta, je loko'e potani sogandone todi nakhi ane payagambarane desanikala karava mateni cinta kare che ane prathama te loko'e ja saru'ata kari che. Sum tame temanathi daro cho? Allaha ja vadhare haka dharave che ke tame teno dara rakho, etala mate ke tame imanavala cho
